fields.name: searchable
fields.label: Search permissions
fields.hint: Permission for search. If left blank, anybody could search this entity

fields.name: createable
fields.label: Create permissions
fields.hint: Permission for creating. If left blank, anybody could create new items of this type

fields.name: editable
fields.label: Update permissions
fields.hint: Permission for updating. If left blank, anybody could update this type of entities

fields.name: deleteable
fields.label: Delete permissions
fields.hint: Permission for deleting. If left blank, anybody could delete entities
